Package model

Class SponsorshipRequest

Object
model.SponsorshipRequest
public class SponsorshipRequest
extends Object
SponsorshipRequests can be optionally created when creating a TicketedEvent. GovernmentRepresentatives review these requests and can accept or reject them.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SponsorshipRequest​(long requestNumber, TicketedEvent event)
    Create a new SponsorshipRequest with status = SponsorshipStatus.PENDING

    • SponsorshipRequest

      public SponsorshipRequest​(long requestNumber, TicketedEvent event)
      Create a new SponsorshipRequest with status = SponsorshipStatus.PENDING
      Parameters:

      event - event that this request is for

    • getSponsoredPricePercent

      public Integer getSponsoredPricePercent()
      Returns:
      Sponsored price %, if the request is accepted by the government, and null otherwise

    • getSponsorAccountEmail

      public String getSponsorAccountEmail()
      Returns:
      The sponsor's PaymentSystem account email address if the request is accepted by the government, and null otherwise
